terms.description: Read our terms and conditions to understand the terms for our legalization services.
terms.heading: Terms and Conditions

general.title: 1. General information
general.content: These general terms and conditions ("Terms") govern the use of Legalization Service AB's ("we", "us" or "our") services. By using our services, you accept these terms. These terms apply from the moment you accept them before placing an order.

services.title: 2. Service description
services.content: We offer legalization services for documents to be used abroad. This includes document handling, communication with relevant authorities, embassies and other instances, as well as document transport.

customerResponsibility.title: 3. Customer responsibility
customerResponsibility.content: As a customer, you are responsible for:
items: Specifying the correct destination and legalization requirements
Paying for the services according to agreement
Checking that all information is correct before ordering

liability.title: 4. Our responsibility and limitations
liability.content: We strive to provide high-quality services, but the following limitations apply:
items: Transport responsibility: We take no responsibility for lost or delayed mail during transport. This is exclusively the transport company's responsibility.
Authority guarantees: We can never guarantee that an authority, embassy, notary or other instance performs what is requested. This is always up to the respective instance and their assessment.
Timeframes: Specified timeframes are estimates and may vary depending on authorities' processing times.
Document integrity: We handle your documents with the greatest care, but cannot guarantee that external parties do not cause damage.

pricing.title: 5. Prices and payment
pricing.content: Prices are stated excluding VAT and other fees. Payment shall be made according to the payment terms specified at the time of order. We reserve the right to change prices, but changes do not affect ongoing orders.

cancellation.title: 6. Cancellation and refunds
cancellation.content: Orders can be cancelled before processing has begun. After processing has begun, an administration fee will be charged. Refunds are made according to applicable legislation and our internal procedures.

forceMajeure.title: 7. Force majeure
forceMajeure.content: We are not responsible for delays or non-delivery of services due to circumstances beyond our control, such as natural disasters, wars, strikes, government decisions or technical problems.

law.title: 8. Applicable law and disputes
law.content: These terms are governed by Swedish law. Any disputes shall be resolved through Swedish courts with Stockholm as the first instance.

changes.title: 9. Changes to terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these terms. Changes take effect when published on our website. Continued use of our services after changes implies acceptance of the new terms.
